Header: Rui Costa takes opening leg of the Saudi Tour
Content: Portugal’s Rui Costa took the opening stage of the Saudi Tour for UAE Team Emirates riding 173km through the desert from Riyadh to Jaww in just under 4 hours.A tight pack crossed the finish line immediately behind Costa with Australia’s Heinrich Haussler of Bahrain – McLaren coming in second followed by France’s NacerBouhanni who placed third for Team Arkea – Samsic.Stage 2 will take the riders 187km fromSadus Castle to Al Bujairi on Wednesday with the 5-stage race wrapping up in Riyadh.
